name: Dalbello Panterra 100 GW Ski Boots
description: Ski from squares to diamonds. A nicely featured all-mountain boot, the Panterra 100 GW design puts the spotlight on performance without sacrificing comfort. In a medium flex, these boots have the guts to tackle steeper terrain and tighter turns. Their 3-piece shell construction is customizable, so you can make these boots truly your own. Superbly crafted liners are ready to ski new, or you can thermo-mould them for instant next-level comfort.  And with micro-adjust buckles, you can modify the boot's tightness throughout your day.Lightweight PU shell construction reduces weight.Cabrio 3 piece shell design flexes consistently and absorbs shock.Variable Volume Fit allows adjustment of the forefoot width.Contour 4 Fit Technology fits securely while allowing extra room where needed.My Fit system offers customizable fit at the shell and liner.Adjustable rear cuff lets you customize the boot's height to your calf.Dynalink heel strap keeps the foot from sliding.Grip Walk soles allow nearly-normal walking with a rockered design.Dura-grip replaceable heels and toes.
